column4: im 5 hrs new with ubunto...i just cant run my volume control it say  " please update it by running gst-register" any suggestions...or help
i just cant open it...that li\ttle speaker near the TIME its marked X
You may have the same problem I did at first. Right click on the little speaker thing in the top right, chose Open Volume Control, go to Switches, and make sure that your sound thing is checked
